title: Print, ca. 1788
inscribed:
Imprinted from lower left to lower left center: Fontaine forme d'un Tombeau Antique et debris/de Mabre qui se voit sur une place pres la/Catedrale de Tivoli Ville distante de Rome 18 Milles/Aubert P. fecit.

Imprited lower center: Vase de Composition, le petit Esculape se voit a la Galerie de Florence L'Autel est un Marbre Antuqie du Museum du Vatican: Dessine a Rome en 1789 par Aubert P.
provenance: From the Collection of Léon Decloux
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: At center is a large vase with snake handles flanked by a much smaller fountain designed like an antique tomb. At left is a small sepelchre on a fragment of a corinthian column.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, ca. 1788.
ca. 1788. Sheet: 43.7 x 29.5 cm (17 3/16 x 11 5/8 in.). Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-228-1.
